content.short_description: A group of professional voice actors play Dungeons & Dragons, leading to a campaign and characters that have a life of their own.
content.notes: A sharp and witty take on the D&D setting with a rich depth thats hard to find outside of animation. The story is gripping, and the pacing is top notch. I never felt like it was moving too fast, as it always took time to breath life into the setting. The characters are incredibly well developed, and I love that there isn't really a central character. They all have plenty of time in the sun. Visually it is some of my favorite animation i've had the please of watching. I don't watch a ton of animated content, but this felt a step above.
